other_title: アイカツ スターズ！ (Japanese)
plot: Yume Nijino aims to become a top idol, and she enrolls in the Yotsusei Gakuen (Four Stars Academy). This academy has a special group called the S4, who are the top four active idols in the school. Yume and the other first-year students aim to become a part of the S4.
opening_theme: "Start Line!" (スタートライン!) by Sena & Rie from AIKATSU☆STARS!
ending_theme: "episode Solo" by Ruka, Nanase, Kana, & Miho from AIKATSU☆STARS!
"Mori no Hikari no Pirouette" (森のひかりのピルエット) by AIKATSU☆STARS！
